name: new york times streamlined
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain("nytimes.com") { .articleTools, #bColumn, #login, #adxLeaderboard, #masthead, #navigation{display:none !important;} #article p{line-height:1.7em; margin-bottom:2.5em; font-family: "Lucida Grande";} #articleBody{font-size:140% !important;} }
